Text.Name: Ls_Fanshi
Text.Desc: Inflict an amount of damage relative to the Max Qi of the enemy's artifact, as well as disabling its ability to use the artifact for a period of time.

Text.Name: Ls_AddModifier
Text.Desc: Greatly improves the strength of a friendly Qi Barrier and Toughness of its Secret Body.

Text.Name: Ls_Confuse
Text.Desc: Confuse an enemy so that it cannot attack or move, but will wake up if attacked.

Text.Name: Ls_Rongduan
Text.Desc: Use the power of inferno to deal distributable damage on an enemy, as well as disabling its ability to cast spells for a period of time.
